title: Grade card( sem 1)
content: I heard they will be disturbing the physical copy of grade card every sem and they still haven't. And when they do can everyone see sgpa or is the privacy maintained?

comments.body:
they already distributed for RR campus  
yes you can see everyone's cgpa on the sheet you sign but everyone will be waiting in a line so you won't have time.
few sections in ecc got the grade cards and certificates
This is IIT Bangalore , privacy is NOT maintained here ðŸ¥€ðŸ¥€

You have to sign an next to your name on an a3 size sheet. Most people barely give a fuck unless it's the top students. Just to know where the toppers are. People generally don't care about the others as much. Maybe one or two nosy pricks might
If the data is with everyone, then there is no need to implement data security âœ…
Please ask Deepa Nair and Karthiyayani O ma'am
My section hasn't received it yet, hence I wanted to know. I don't think there is any problem in just listing the sections which got it. He/she can delete the msg later in case of privacy issues.Â
